State.Author: Freemonke
State.Description: New LOD noise texture for Mid Frequency Details, helps blend far terrain with closer details.
State.Name: Contrasted LOD Noise Texture

State.Author: Ozmandiaz
State.Description: Adds 128 new LOD objects to Fo3
State.Name: Fallout 3 LOD

State.Author: FaramH
State.Description: Adds Lod for Barns, Water Tanks, and 5 types of overpass objects
State.Name: More LOD

State.Author: poke
State.Description: FaceGen textures for UUF3P and Goodies generated with MorningSpice's modified EGT files.
State.Name: Mostly Fixed FaceGen Tints for UUF3P and Goodies

State.Author: poke808
State.Description: A Vanilla+ Wabbajack for Fallout 3 (Unreleased)
State.Name: Waters of Life

State.Author: poke808
State.Description: A Vanilla+ Wabbajack for Fallout 3 (Unreleased)
State.Name: Waters of Life

State.Author: Artorp
State.Description: Moves Somah and Paulson back into the bridge if they survived the Zeta\'s MQ
State.Name: Zeta Enable Somah Paulson

State.Author: doitsujin - Joshua Ashton - Sporif - Ph42oN - Lilium - Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Latest release of DXVK and its HDR variant. Preconfigured for FNV compatibility.
State.Name: DXVK

State.Author: ChesB
State.Description: Fixes flickering multicolored squares appear Fallout 3 Intel HD Bypass on Intel Graphics card or DXVK rendering with other cards. Allows enabling HDR screen effect + Antialiasing + Water Refraction, Bloom same time.
State.Name: FO3 Decal Flickering Fix

State.Author: Some Chump
State.Description:
Adds in the street and bus from the intro movie.
And aligns the GNR building in Chevy Chase with the rear of the building in Dupont Circle, as well as aligns Dupont circle with the in game map.
State.Name: Intro Street Bus and Dupont Alignment

State.Author: craftablescience
State.Description: I was unsatisfied with how the existing Steam overlay / playtime tracker mods worked, and decided to make a better one. (It was originally going to pause the game when the overlay is open too, but I don't know x86 ASM. Maybe one day...)
State.Name: Yet Another Steam Overlay Fixer

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Cleans up HUD textures (such as the compass ticks or other arrows) that have went unnoticed. The cleaning consists of removing the old noise, and sometimes i replace the old noise with a new one.
State.Name: Clean Vanilla Hud

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
FOSE plugin adding a few additional functions and engine bugfixes ported from JIP LN NVSE. 

Includes FalloutCustom.ini support and ‘Search’ console command.
State.Name: Command Extender

State.Author: Ian Patterson - Stephen Abel - Paul Connelly
State.Description: The Fallout Script Extender, or FOSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout 3. It does so without modifying the Fallout3.exe or the G.E.C.K. files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.
State.Name: Fallout Script Extender (FOSE)

State.Author: Hairylegs222
State.Description: Essential things I personally feel the game should have, and why weren't many things like that in the first place. Grey area fixes, non fixes, integrations, and implementations.
State.Name: Goodies

State.Author: Scott Clam - Lucas9
State.Description: HD 2K retexture of the in game moon using NASA satellite images. 1k version available.
State.Name: HD Moon 2K - NASA Satellite Images

State.Author: krzymar
State.Description:
High-resolution and brighter textures of visible Moon phases
(updated 23 Nov 2008 to 0.2.0)
State.Name: krzymar HI-RES Moon

State.Author: Drarack
State.Description: This mod aims to add atmosphere and a greater sense of a town being lived in through lighting and a couple of daily scripted events tied to the lighting. Also adds interior lighting to Moriaty's Saloon and The Church of Atom.
State.Name: Megaton Illuminated

State.Author: dartstalker - pilamin
State.Description: Adds 67 new lod meshes to the wasteland
State.Name: Much Needed LOD FO3

State.Author: doodlum
State.Description: Advanced overhaul for the weather system in The Capital Wasteland, The Pitt, Anchorage, and Point Lookout, which stays true to the original mood of the game.
State.Name: True Weathers

State.Author: c6 - yvileapsis
State.Description: Adds floating markers for quest objectives.
State.Name: Visual Objectives (FOSE)

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Threw everything I had into one pack to celebrate 10 years of... this.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack

State.Author: User_1205226
State.Description:
A small replacement mod to give the Graffiti a slight blending effect, revealing the underneath texture.

*Update* Graffiti from The Pitt have been added.
State.Name: Blending Graffiti

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist
State.Description: This is a faithful recreation of the Vault Boy Paper Doll. You'll see the paper doll when you take damage or in the Condition menu in your Pip-Boy. Fixes a couple of alignment issues too.
State.Name: Clean Vault Boy Paper Doll

State.Author: c6 - ItsMeJesusHChrist
State.Description: A recreation of the companion wheel from New Vegas.
State.Name: Companion Wheel (FOSE)

State.Author: MorningSpice
State.Description: Mostly effective fungal treatment for facegen.
State.Name: Mostly Fixed FaceGen Tints (NV or TTW)

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
Clean first person animations for New Vegas. No new idles, no bugs, no reload cancelling from shooting early or crouching, no compatibility issues.



Now with kNVSE!



Please see the "Animations" section for video demonstrations of the animations. Please visit the "Changelog" tab to keep up with what is added.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations

State.Author: Ehamloptiran Sheson and FO3Edit Team
State.Description: An almost one-click LOD generator for Fallout 3
State.Name: FO3LODGen

State.Author: AtomicTEM
State.Description: Adds True Iron Sights animations and meshes to Fallout 3's Weapons using lStewieAl Tweaks Iron sight nodes.
State.Name: Iron Sights Plus

State.Author: lauren_dr
State.Description: I have added 250 real world poems, wise cracks, and words of wisdom plucked from bathroom stalls throughout the lands to all public and utility stalls in the Capital Wasteland.
State.Name: Laurens Bathroom Poetry

State.Author: BlackBubble1
State.Description: Conversion of LODIFY for TTW. Adds over 50 new LODs to Fallout 3
State.Name: LODIFY - Fallout 3 Conversion

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: My custom locomotion uploaded as separate files for use either as a direct vanilla replacer or to add in to kNVSE sets. Nothing crazy. Uploaded on request.
State.Name: rockomotion

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
An espless collection of optional game tweaks with an INI to configure settings. 

Includes Faster Sleep Wait, Deselect Quests, Compass Height Indicator and more.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks

State.Author: zzjay
State.Description:
I always tought vanilla hairs werw a bit too hiny...this mod will fix that.

Normalmaps replacer for vanilla hairs.
State.Name: Vanilla Hair - No Shine

State.Author: Pixelhate
State.Description: Replaces the Vault Boy Bobbleheads with Vault Girls. 3 options to choose from: Blonde hair, Red hair or Dark hair.
State.Name: Vault Girl Bobbleheads

State.Author: Pixelhate
State.Description: Replaces the Vault Boy Bobbleheads with Vault Girls. 3 options to choose from: Blonde hair, Red hair or Dark hair.
State.Name: Vault Girl Bobbleheads

State.Author: Yaruosu
State.Description: Replace awfull vanilla DC Wasteland LOD for rocks and cliffs for a better transition.
State.Name: Wasted LOD - Cliffs

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Vanilla replacers only. No ESP.
State.Name: Windows To The Soul - Full Vanilla Eye Retexture

State.Author: Ranger Dave - FalloutKid14 - NavaroBL - audixas
State.Description: This is a port of audixas very popular and well-known mod AWSOME, deriving from the original mod Weapon Sounds Overhaul by FalloutKid14 from Fallout New Vegas. As well as NavaroBL who had the courtesy of letting me use some of his sound effects!
State.Name: All Weapon Sounds Overhaul Modern Edition - A.W.S.O.M.E

State.Author: castisass
State.Description: New 4k star texture and mesh using NASA satellite images to create a real-world accurate starfield for Fallout 3.
State.Name: Accurate NASA Stars

State.Author: User_1205226
State.Description:
A small replacement mod to give the Graffiti a slight blending effect, revealing the underneath texture.

*Update* Graffiti from The Pitt have been added.
State.Name: Blending Graffiti

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons. They are immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons v4

State.Author: ncrlover
State.Description: Interior/Exterior Ambient OverHaul
State.Name: eerie ambient

Original.Name: Intro Street Bus and Teaser Ruins Unofficial Fixed-24751-1-0-1-1624311906.7z

State.Author: bigpete - Roy Batty
State.Description: Adds the intro street bus to Chevy Chase, aligns Dupont on the map and adds the teaser trailer ruins just outside Springvale.
State.Name: Intro Street Bus and Trailer Ruins Unofficial Fixed

State.Author: Kyndra72
State.Description: Changes the firing dialogue when you dismiss companions to make them less whiney and make you more polite.
State.Name: Nicer Companion Firing Dialogue

State.Author: Hairylegs222 RoyBatterian
State.Description: Entirely remade patch that fixes bugs and fixes/restores cut content.
State.Name: Updated Unofficial Fallout 3 Patch

State.Author: TheKetzku
State.Description:
Take your immersion to the next level.

More than 200 new ambient sound effects.

Over 3000 hand places sound emitters.

3D sound effect with actual distance and direction in the gameworld.
State.Name: ATMOS Ambient Sound Overhaul

State.Author: SophieBaybey
State.Description: Replaces the impact sounds of various physics objects in the game, such as metal objects and glass, with newer, higher quality audio.

State.Author: Ludo
State.Description: Backyard Shelters is an authentic, lore-friendly new location mod inspired by concept art by the legendary Adam Adamowicz.

State.Author: ledzepiv - AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: This mod aims to add more reactivity to Fallout 3, as well as featuring minor NPC and clutter additions and integrating some furniture markers from the DLCs.

State.Description: I made this because I hated how the default texture looked.
State.Name: Earth from Space texture for Mothership Zeta

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Fugacity is a lightweight, vanilla-plus difficulty and balance mod that provides a comprehensive set of balance tweaks to make the game subtly harder, but preserves the spirit of the vanilla game.
State.Name: Fugacity - Vanilla-Plus Balance and Difficulty Overhaul

Original.Name: Nicer Red and Shorty's Death Dialogue-25607-1-0-1681241365.zip

State.Description: Changes the dialogue you can use to tell Red and Shorty's friends if they're dead to a much nicer version.

State.Description: Sets the generic Protectron found inside the Nuka-Cola Plant to use the Factory variant from The Pitt.

State.Description: Improves game performance in combat by disabling lights produced by muzzle flashes.
State.Name: No Muzzle Flash Lights

State.Author: Drarack
State.Description: Restore HP by warming yourself by a fire - get too close and you'll get burned. Flames, steam, electricity, fire barrels, and toxic pools can restore ap/hp or harm them.
State.Name: The GoodBad Touch

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Restores the ending of Fallout 3 that was changed in Broken Steel. The player no longer miraculously survives turning on the purifier, and has to sacrifice Sarah or bring a companion to continue.
State.Name: Fallout 3 Ending Restored

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Improves framerate in combat by fixing an engine bug that lowered framerate while attacking an enemy with a health-bar visible.

State.Description: Project to extend GECK functionality and bug fixes. Ported from the New Vegas version.

State.Description: A high-resolution replacement for the default night sky taken from real astrophotography.

State.Description: A repository of conversions, compatible files, and links to compatible mods from New Vegas Nexus

GOG, Steam and Epic Games compatible.
